alert.note: Alert for Lancaster (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 7:01PM EDT until July 02 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN LANCASTER COUNTY... At 701 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Terre Hill, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Ephrata, New Holland, Terre Hill, Churchtown, Bowmansville, Fivepointville, Blue Ball, Farmersville and Goodville. This includes The Pennsylvania Turnpike from mile markers 289 to 295. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
